title: Email on Pixel 2 Google Newsfeed
content: On Google News Feed, I opened a story and then selected an Email icon to share the story. Accidentally, I checked "Always" and then chose my Outlook email account. Now I can't find the setting that will allow me to restore the default, was to ask me to choose the email account I want whenever I click on an email icon.  Thanks in advance.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
